Package gw.api.properties

Class RuntimePropertyRetriever

java.lang.Object
gw.api.properties.RuntimePropertyRetriever
public class RuntimePropertyRetriever extends Object
Utility for accessing Runtime Properties.

  • Method Details

    • getBooleanProperty

      public Boolean getBooleanProperty(String propertyName)
      Get the Boolean value for a property with the given name.
      Parameters:
      propertyName - the name of the property.
      Returns:
      the Boolean value for the specified property, or null if the property is not found.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the string cannot be parsed as Boolean

    • getBooleanProperties

      public Boolean[] getBooleanProperties(String propertyName, String delimiter)
      Get the Boolean values for a property with the given name. Multiple property values are delimited by a character specified as a parameter for delimiter, which is a comma by default. Embedded commas or other delimiters within a property are not supported.
      Parameters:
      propertyName - the name of the property.
      Returns:
      the Boolean values for the specified property, or null if the property is not found.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the string cannot be parsed as Boolean

    • getIntegerProperties

      public Integer[] getIntegerProperties(String propertyName, String delimiter)
      Get the Integer values for a property with the given name. Multiple property values are delimited by a character specified as a parameter for delimiter, which is a comma by default. Embedded commas or other delimiters within a property are not supported.
      Parameters:
      propertyName - the name of the property.
      Returns:
      the Integer values for the specified property, or null if the property is not found.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the string cannot be parsed as Integer

    • getLongProperties

      public Long[] getLongProperties(String propertyName, String delimiter)
      Get the Long values for a property with the given name. Multiple property values are delimited by a character specified as a parameter for delimiter, which is a comma by default. Embedded commas or other delimiters within a property are not supported.
      Parameters:
      propertyName - the name of the property.
      Returns:
      the Long values for the specified property, or null if the property is not found.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the string cannot be parsed as Long

    • getStringProperties

      public String[] getStringProperties(String propertyName, String delimiter)
      Get the String values for a property with the given name. Multiple property values are delimited by a character specified as a parameter for delimiter, which is a comma by default. Embedded commas or other delimiters within a property are not supported.
      Parameters:
      propertyName - the name of the property.
      Returns:
      the String values for the specified property, or null if the property is not found.

    • buildFullName

      public String buildFullName(String propertyName, String propertyContext)
      Build the full property name from the name and context. This is not used internally.
      Parameters:
      propertyName - the property name.
      propertyContext - the property context.
      Returns:
      the full property name.

    • createNewInstance

      public Object createNewInstance(String propertyName)
      Instantiate a new object using the given property as the full pathname of the class to create.
      Parameters:
      propertyName - the name of the property.
      Returns:
      a new instance of the specified class.

    • createNewInstance

      public Object createNewInstance(String propertyName, Object[] constructorArguments)
      Instantiate a new object using the given property as the full pathname of the class to create.
      Parameters:
      propertyName - the name of the property.
      constructorArguments - the arguments passed to the constructor.
      Returns:
      a new instance of the specified class.

    • retrieveAllProperties

      public Properties retrieveAllProperties()
      Retrieve all properties for this PropertyGroup. The returned object is not dynamic it is a snapshot of the current RuntimeProperties state.
      Returns:
      all properties for this PropertyGroup.

    • getGroup

      public RuntimePropertyGroup getGroup()
      returns the group for this instance of the retriever
      Returns:
      the group
